paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a new TTR variant associated with systemic senile amyloidosis, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Identification of a new variant Pa (TTr) molecule in one case suggests further that SSA may be a genetically determined disease expressed late in life.

functional_data.summary: The variant was identified through complete sequence analysis and showed immunologic and biochemical similarity to familial amyloidotic polyneuropathy.

variants.segregation_data: The variant was identified in a single case, suggesting potential genetic determination.
variants.additional_notes: The variant was associated with systemic senile amyloidosis, indicating a potential late-onset genetic condition.
key_quotes: Identification of a new variant Pa (TTr) molecule in one case suggests further that SSA may be a genetically determined disease expressed late in life.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data was straightforward as the paper focused on a single TTR variant.
